articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Pediatric Intensive Interdisciplinary Pain Treatments
articles.contents:
This website contains all treatment characteristics we identified through our literature search for our systematic review and meta-analysis regarding Intensive Interdisciplinary Pain Treatment for children and adolescents (Claus et al. 2021).



Claus, Benedikt B., Lorin Stahlschmidt, Emma Dunford, János Major, Cynthia Harbeck-Weber, Rashmi P. Bhandari, Ardith Baerveldt, et al. 2021. “Intensive Interdisciplinary Pain Treatment for Children and Adolescents with Chronic Non-cancer Pain: A Preregistered Systematic Review and Individual Patient Data Meta-analysis.” Pain.
